ygData.subject: Re: Hehehehehehehe......
ygData.msgSnippet: From atop MT Fuji Prebon continues to wait for his troops when he detects a warp in the distance. Activating his jetpack he rockets to the southwest into China

Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

From atop MT Fuji Prebon continues to wait for his troops when he detects a=
 warp in the distance. Activating his jetpack he rockets to the southwest i=
nto China to investigate. Before launching he leaves a comm chip with a mes=
sage for his trainees if they were to show up. The instructions read to tra=
nsform to beast mode and remain there until his return.
  ----- Original Me=
ssage ----- 
  From: LurkerAbyss 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Fri=
day, July 13, 2001 3:25 PM
  Subject: Hehehehehehehe......


      Off in a=
 deserted part of China, a strange thing happened.  It was silent and brigh=
t.  And just when it seemed nothing would ever happen there until future Ea=
rth, something did happen.  Out of nowhere, a big blue portal appeared.  Th=
en, the portal warped in a strange alien building!  The building resembled =
a pyramid sort of, with a strange blue crystal at the top.  At each corner,=
 there were long pole-like things sticking up.  Then, several other smaller=
 blue portals appeared, and each one warped in.....Alien creatures!  But al=
ien creatures didn't seem like the right word(s) for these.....People.  Yes=
, a people.  Not a human people, but an extra-terrestrial people.  Two of t=
hem were wearing some bandana-thing over their mouths, and each had a sort =
of cape on.  And, strangely, these peeps were permanently cloaked(invisible=
).  They had strange blades too.  
   
          Two of the other warriors,=
 well, they looked like warriors anyway, wore strange-but-cool armour, and =
on their back-hands they had little gadgets which, when activated, emitted =
little blades made out of a blue lazer material.  
   
          The next t=
wo people that arrived were also strange.  They wore strange armour, but it=
 wasn't combat armour.  You couldn't see their faces, all you could see was=
 blackness and then two red, glowing dots, their eyes.  They looked like ma=
gic-users, or priests or something that represented mysticism, religion or =
sorcery.
   
          Finally, the last two....people....were warped in.  =
These didn't look like the others!  They looked more mechanical than biolog=
ical.  The had four legs, two at each end, robotic legs.  At the top they h=
ad robotic armour and shit.  
   
          But, it wasn't the end of the w=
arping!  Two, much larger, blue portals appeared....In the sky!  Then, emer=
ged two big ships(I won't powergame).  Hehe, if you looked at them, they al=
most resembled bumbe-bees.  But then again, not really.  The two ships flew=
 out of the warping portal, then they hovered high in the air, casting an i=
mmense shadow over the building and the people.  They stayed there.  
   
 =
         "Ah, Zeratul, we've arrived at a strange planet indeed.....Why, it=
 reminds me of Tarsonis, but, it seems.....different," said one of the cloa=
ked dudes to the other one.
   
          "Yes, Toranis, it does resemble t=
he Terran Raynor's homeworld quite closely...." Zeratul said.
   
         =
 "My brethren!" shouted one of the dudes with lazer blades, "This must be t=
he UED homeworld, Earth!!!"
   
          "Why, I believe you're correct, A=
llanon!  But it seems.....Uninhabited," Zeratul replied.
   
          The =
two mage-looking guys, who's names were Anthradar and Azlis, spoke up.
   
=
          "This world isn't uninhabited.....I feel a presence on this plane=
t....But it's definitely not Terran or Human," Azlis said.
   
          "M=
y brother is correct," Anthradar added.
   
          "Well, then we should=
 explore this planet," Toranis suggested.
   
          The other dude with=
 lazer blades, named Amostitus, nodded, and said, "Perhaps, we should send =
the Carriers to scout...."
   
          "That would be a good idea....." Z=
eratul said.
   
          And so they did send the Carriers.  The Carriers=
 were the two large ships.  The names of the ships were the Gantrathor III =
and the Slasidor...
   
  OOC: Hehe, anybody own this game and know what I'=
m talking about?

hoo! Groups is subject to the Yahoo! Terms of Service.
